name: Improved Horse Whisperer
text: Your understanding of horses goes so deep that you can communicate with them as if you shared a language.
prerequisites: Horse Whisperer, Handle Animal 5 ranks, Ride 5 ranks.
benefit: With a successful DC 20 Handle Animal check, you can communicate with a horse as if you were using speak with animals for 1 round. The horseâ€™s ability to communicate and take actions is still limited by its intelligence.
